channel.title: Problem with torrents
channel.description: i have azureus...i was trying to download a file the size of 2.84 MB from demonoid.com but i was downloading so slow i couldnt believe it. during the setup i sort of rushed through it all beacuse i hardly understood a thing like ports and stuff.(im new to torrents). yeah so it was downloading very slow and the speed was 500 and something B/s (average). down the bottom the ratio button was red. next to that firewalled was red. next to that DHT firewalled was yellowish. i have broadband with optus, and i use a wireless router. can someone help me speed it up becuase when downloading other stuff it was way way quicker. :confused: and also i have NOD32 anti virus maybe thats got something to do with it? plz help, thanks THE FAT COBRA

item.title: Problem with torrents
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

You will have to forward the ports that you have set azureus to use, if you have a firewall you will also have to allow those ports

www.portforward.com

Read full topic
